entry.title: 数据库模块(二)
entry.content:
安装​

$ pnpm add @nestjs/typeorm typeorm mysql2

数据库模块​

$ nest g mo databases

databases.module.ts

import { Global, Module } from "@nestjs/common";
import { TypeOrmModule } from "@nestjs/typeorm";

@Global()
@Module({
  imports: [
    TypeOrmModule.forRoot({
      type: "mysql",
      host: "localhost",
      port: 3306,
      username: "root",
      password: "12345678",
      database: "test",
      autoLoadEntities: true,
      synchronize: true,
    }),
  ],
  controllers: [],
  providers: [],
  exports: [],
})
export class DatabasesModule {}

dtos/pagination.dto.ts

export class PagintionDto {
  /**
   * 每页条数
   */
  limit?: number;
  /**
   * 当前页数
   */
  page?: number;
}

User 模块​

@Module({
  imports: [TypeOrmModule.forFeature([User])],
  controllers: [UsersController],
  providers: [UsersService],
})
export class UsersModule {}

模型​

user.entity.ts

import { Entity, Column, PrimaryGeneratedColumn } from "typeorm";

@Entity()
export class User {
  @PrimaryGeneratedColumn()
  id: number;

  @Column()
  firstName: string;

  @Column()
  lastName: string;

  @Column({ default: true })
  isActive: boolean;
}

create-user.dto.ts

export class CreateUserDto {
  firstName: string;

  lastName: string;

  isActive?: boolean;
}

控制器​

users.controller.ts

@Get()
findAll(@Query() pagintionDto: PagintionDto) {
  return this.usersService.findAll(pagintionDto);
}

服务类​

users.service.ts

@Injectable()
export class UsersService {
  constructor(
    @InjectRepository(User) private usersRepository: Repository<User>
  ) {}

  async create(createUserDto: CreateUserDto) {
    const item = await this.usersRepository.save(createUserDto);
    return item;
  }

  async findAll(pagintionDto: PagintionDto) {
    const { limit = 10, page = 1 } = pagintionDto;
    return this.usersRepository.find({
      skip: (page - 1) * limit,
      take: limit,
    });
  }

  async findOne(id: number) {
    const item = await this.usersRepository.findOneOrFail({ where: { id } });
    if (!item) {
      throw new EntityNotFoundError(User, `User entity not found,id is ${id}`);
    }
    return item;
  }

  async update(id: number, updateUserDto: UpdateUserDto) {
    await this.usersRepository.update(id, updateUserDto);
    return this.findOne(id);
  }

  async remove(id: number) {
    const item = await this.findOne(id);
    return this.usersRepository.remove(item);
  }
}

entry.title: 创建项目(一)
entry.content:
NestCLI​

$ npm i -g @nestjs/cli

创建项目​

$ nest new nestjs-restful-template
⚡  We will scaffold your app in a few seconds..

? Which package manager would you ❤️  to use? pnpm
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/.eslintrc.js (663 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/.prettierrc (51 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/nest-cli.json (171 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/package.json (1964 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/README.md (3347 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/tsconfig.build.json (97 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/tsconfig.json (546 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/src/app.controller.spec.ts (617 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/src/app.controller.ts (274 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/src/app.module.ts (249 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/src/app.service.ts (142 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/src/main.ts (208 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/test/app.e2e-spec.ts (630 bytes)
CREATE nestjs-restful-template/test/jest-e2e.json (183 bytes)

✔ Installation in progress... ☕

🚀  Successfully created project nestjs-restful-template
👉  Get started with the following commands:

$ cd nestjs-restful-template
$ pnpm run start

生成 CRUD​

$ nest g res users --no-spec
? What transport layer do you use? REST API
? Would you like to generate CRUD entry points? Yes
CREATE src/users/users.controller.ts (894 bytes)
CREATE src/users/users.module.ts (248 bytes)
CREATE src/users/users.service.ts (609 bytes)
CREATE src/users/dto/create-user.dto.ts (30 bytes)
CREATE src/users/dto/update-user.dto.ts (169 bytes)
CREATE src/users/entities/user.entity.ts (21 bytes)
UPDATE package.json (1997 bytes)
UPDATE src/app.module.ts (195 bytes)
✔ Packages installed successfully.
